تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Hagop

 

Not sure if you can help.  We have the attached invoice received but it has been invoiced to Real FZE for our account.  Are you able to comply with Debai regulations (the authorities have not accepted it)and issue this direct to Ella Afrique FZCO?  Failing that we will have to ask Real FZE to invoice us.

 

Many thanks and regards

Anthea

 

 

 

Finance Manager

Ella Afrique FZCO
